arts.ttl: Mbappe sends message after latest Real Madrid disaster
arts.sum: Kylian Mbappe ’s integration at Real Madrid continued to stall on Wednesday as he missed another penalty in a 2-1 loss to in-form Athletic Club in another blow to Los Blancos’ LaLiga hopes. Marca asks: “The easiest thing is to target Kylian Mbappe and not tackle the real problem, which is in the team's plan.

arts.ttl: Kylian Mbappé makes Real Madrid confession after another penalty miss in Athletic Club defeat
arts.sum: Real Madrid missed the chance to keep the pressure up on Barcelona at the top of LaLiga, slumping to a 2-1 defeat away to Athletic Club in Bilbao, with Kylian Mbappé missing a second penalty in three games. Exactly a week earlier, the French attacker had seen an almost identical penalty saved by Liverpool’s Caoimhin Kelleher, also when Madrid were 1-0 down in the second half of their 2-0 Champions League defeat to Arne Slot’s team.

arts.ttl: Real Madrid potential 2025 Club World Cup opponents
arts.sum: Real Madrid could come up against clubs boasting Neymar, Lionel Messi or Angel Di Maria.

arts.ttl: Kylian Mbappe insists he takes 'full responsibility' for torrid form since moving to Real Madrid after missing ANOTHER penalty in 'difficult' defeat against Athletic Bilbao
arts.sum: Kylian Mbappe honestly admitted he takes 'full responsibility' for his struggles since moving to Real Madrid after missing another penalty in Thursday's 2-1 LaLiga defeat.

arts.ttl: Kylian Mbappe Takes 'Full Responsibility' for Real Madrid's Defeat vs. Athletic Bilbao
arts.sum: Kylian Mbappé accepted blame for Real Madrid's defeat to Athletic Bilbao after missing a penalty.

arts.ttl: Kylian Mbappe’s spot-kick woe goes on as Real Madrid lose at Athletic Bilbao
arts.sum: Fiorentina also suffered a shock defeat to Empoli in the Coppa Italia.

arts.ttl: Carlo Ancelotti labels Real Madrid star ‘untouchable’ after mistake vs Athletic Club
arts.sum: Real Madrid head coach Carlo Ancelotti was quick to throw his backing behind Federico Valverde, on the back of the club’s meeting with Athletic Club. This comes after the midfielder…

arts.ttl: Another Kylian Mbappe Missed Penalty Costs Real Madrid: Takeaways From 1-2 Defeat vs. Athletic Bilbao
arts.sum: Kylian Mbappé failed to convert from the spot in Real Madrid's 1–2 defeat to Athletic Bilbao in La Liga.

arts.ttl: Athletic Club 2-1 Real Madrid: Player ratings as Mbappe misses penalty in disappointing defeat
arts.sum: Player ratings from Real Madrid's 2-1 La Liga defeat to Athletic Club.
